originalText.text: I am very pleased with my purchase at Belle Nubian Skin Care every time cause Joahan the manager is very knowledgeable about the products. He is very polite and a great businesses man who knows how to work with customers and give them the correct products for their skin type. I am a skin specialist and acknowledging his skills in the know about this good products, I am so pleased. Belle nubia products are the best products on the markets for all skin disorders and types, and they do work with no doubts about it. I personally only use their supplements the gluta and their vitamin C serum and I can't tell you how please I am with the glow and brightness in my skin. I look so youthful, radiant, vibrant, and drop gorgeous. I am highly recommending Joahan to any customer who wants the correct products for his or her skin disorder with no regrets. Belle Nubia Skincare is my life and I am highly recommending it to anyone with whatever skin problems you have. I love it. ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèæ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Belle Nubian is a great cosmetic line. I've been using the product for 3 years now.  I have more recently been buying specifically from Tacara from the Harlem store.  She has informed me of how to use my products and how to salvage my skin. I truly appreciate her customer service.  I highly recommend Belle Nubian and for great customer service see Tacara at the Harlem store.
